column1: Who all can add photos to my Page?
column2: You can choose who all can add Photos to your Page while creating your Page, by choosing the appropriate option for the “Photo Creation Privacy” field. You can edit this privacy any time by clicking on the “Edit Page Details” link for your Page.

column1: How can I add photos to my Page?
column2:
You can add Photos to your Page in one of the following ways:
1. To upload Photos, please follow the steps below:
a. Go to the Page Profile.   
b. Click “Photos” tab on the Page Profile. You might have to click on the “More” tab to expand the menu bar to see “Photos”.
c. Click on “Create an Album” link from the top left corner of the “Photos” tab to add photos.
d. From ‘Choose Album’ field, choose to add photos to an existing album or create a new album.
e. Click on ‘Add Photos’ to select photos which you want to add.
f. Fill up the form, while photos are being uploaded.
g. Once the progress bar is complete, click the ‘Save Photos’ button below your photos to save them to your Page Album.

2. From the “Apps” section of your Page Dashboard, click on the “Add Photos” button and       
follow the steps from ‘d’ to ‘g’ as in case 1 above.

column1: How many photos can I add to my Page?
column2: There is no limit on the number of Photos that you can add to your Page. You can add any number of Photos to your Page.

column1: What are Sponsored Page Albums? How can Albums created on my Page be made Sponsored?
column2:
Sponsored Page Albums are those Albums which have been created for Paid Pages. These Sponsored Albums will appear in the “Sponsored Albums” block in the “Albums” section under Page navigation. On “Browse Albums” for Page Albums and in search results, they are marked with a “Sponsored” marker. The search form for Page Albums also has a quick filter for seeing Sponsored Albums.
If your Page is created under a Paid Package, then the Albums created for it would automatically be made Sponsored. The availability of Paid Page Packages on our site is conditional depending on the settings configured by our site administrators.

column1: What are Featured Page Albums? Who can mark Albums for Pages as Featured?
column2:
Featured Page Albums are albums of Pages which are specially marked as “Featured”. Such albums are more highlighted than others and thus gain more visibility. Featured Page Albums appear in the “Featured Albums” slideshow in the “Albums” section under Page navigation. On “Browse Albums” for Page Albums and in search results, they are marked with a “Featured” marker. The search form for Page Albums also has a quick filter for seeing Featured Albums.
Page Albums can be made Featured only by our site administrators.

column1: I want to search for a specific Page Album. How can I do that?
column2: You can search for a Page Album using the detailed search box available in the “Albums” section under Page navigation.

column1: I have a Page on this site. However, the Photos feature is not available for my Page. What could be the reason?
column2:
The reason why Photos feature is not available for your Page could be that, you might have chosen a Package for your Page for which the Photos App is not available. In this case, you can see if choosing a different Package with the Photos App suits you. You can change the Package for your Page from the “Packages” section of your Page Dashboard.
Availability of Packages for Pages, and their features are conditional depending on the settings chosen by our site administrator.
